name: Pong (itch) (SpaceDot)
description:
A pong!

CONTROLS

W or UP ARROW - to move upwards

S or DOWN ARROW  - to move downwards

P - to increase the ball speed (might have wierd resultates at high speed)

M - to decrease the ball speed (might have wierd resultates at negative speed)

LEFT ARROW - to decrease the music volume (Note: It cant be mute)

FEATURES

  • Discord RPC (Shows the Score , Time Comming Soon!)

CONTACT

  • Discord : SpaceDot. | ヌ#4962
